remarks: The Borel algebra on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is generated by the dyadic closed-below, open-above rectangular subsets of ` ( RR X. RR ) ` . Proposition 1.1.5 of [Cohn] p. 4 .  Note that the interval used in this formalization are closed-below, open-above instead of open-below, closed-above in the proof as they are ultimately generated by the floor function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2017.)
